modules.title: Fundamentals of Bioinformatics-Bash
modules.description: A foundational resource covering the fundamental concepts and practices of bioinformatics.

modules.title: Introduction to Data Science for Biology
modules.cardImage: cards/Introduction to Data Science for Biology.png
modules.description: An introductory guide to applying data science principles and techniques to biological data.

modules.title: Foundations of Python for Data Science
modules.cardImage: cards/Foundations of Python for Data Science.png
modules.description: A course on the foundational principles of using the Python programming language for data science applications.

modules.title: Data Science Foundations-
modules.description: A course on the foundational principles of using the R programming language for data science applications.

name: Introduction to Biomedical Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence

modules.title: ML for Biomedical Researchers
modules.description: A resource for biomedical researchers on applying Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML) methods.

modules.title: Analysis of Biomedical Data for Biomarker Discovery
modules.cardImage: cards/Analysis of Biomedical Data for Biomarker Discovery.png
modules.description: A guide to analyzing biomedical data for the purpose of discovering novel biomarkers.

modules.title: Biomedical Imaging Analysis using AI/ML approaches
modules.cardImage: cards/Biomedical Imaging Analysis using AI_ML approaches.png
modules.description: A training module on using AI and ML approaches for the analysis of biomedical imaging data.

modules.title: Consensus Pathway Analysis in the Cloud
modules.cardImage: cards/Consensus Pathway Analysis in the Cloud.png
modules.description: A resource for performing consensus biological pathway analysis using cloud computing platforms.

modules.title: DNA Methylation Sequencing Analysis with WGBS
modules.cardImage: cards/DNA Methylation Sequencing Analysis with WGBS.png
modules.description: A guide to analyzing DNA methylation sequencing data from Whole-Genome Bisulfite Sequencing (WGBS).

modules.title: ATAC-Seq and Single Cell ATAC-Seq Analysis
modules.description: A training resource for analyzing chromatin accessibility using both bulk and single-cell ATAC-Seq data.

modules.title: Chromatin Occupancy with Cut and Run
modules.cardImage: cards/Chromatin Occupancy with Cut and Run.png
modules.description: A resource focused on the analysis of chromatin occupancy data, such as from ChIP-Seq experiments.

modules.title: Integrating Multi-Omics Datasets
modules.description: A guide to methods for integrating and analyzing datasets from multiple omics sources.

modules.title: Introduction to Amplicon-based Metagenomics
modules.description: A training module for performing microbial community analysis using 16S rRNA gene sequencing data.

modules.title: Introduction to Phylogenetics
modules.description: An introductory resource covering the principles and methods of phylogenetic analysis.

modules.title: Introduction to Population Genomics
modules.description: A guide to applying RAD-seq for population genomics and phylogenetics studies.

modules.title: Comparative Prokaryotic Genomics
modules.description: A resource for performing comparative analysis of microbial genomes to understand their evolution and function.

modules.title: Introduction to Pangenomic Methods
modules.description: An introductory guide to the concepts and methods of pangenome analysis.

modules.title: Metagenomics Analysis of Biofilm-Microbiome
modules.description: A training module for the metagenomic analysis of microbial communities within biofilms.

modules.title: Proteome Quantification
modules.description: A resource for methods and workflows related to the quantification of proteomes.

modules.title: Proteome Structures and Docking
modules.description: A resource for methods and workflows related to the quantification of proteomes.

name: Introduction to RNAseq and Transcriptome Assembly

modules.title: Explore RNA methylation using MeRIP-seq
modules.description: A guide for analyzing RNA methylation using MeRIP-seq (Methylated RNA Immunoprecipitation Sequencing) data.

modules.title: RNAseq Differential Expression Analysis
modules.description: A resource for performing differential expression analysis on RNA-Sequencing data.

modules.title: Transcriptome Assembly Refinement and Applications
modules.description: A training module on assembling, refining, and applying transcriptome data.

modules.title: scRNASeq, miRNASeq, and Transcription Factors
modules.description: A resource covering the analysis of both bulk and single-cell RNA sequencing (RNA-seq) data.
